markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Spout](/Spells.aspx?ID=1002)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 130 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** a 5-foot cube

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex saving throw.

 You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Spout

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 130 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** a 5-foot cube

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Reflex

 
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Batter creatures with a water blast that is larger if cast in a body of water.
</summary>
summary: Batter creatures with a water blast that is larger if cast in a body of water.

Any creatures in the area take bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with a basic Reflex saving throw. You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.
